scripts.install: (cd client && yarn install) && (cd server && npm install)
scripts.clean: concurrently "rimraf node_modules" "cd client && rimraf node_modules build" "cd server && rimraf node_modules build"
scripts.build: concurrently "cd client && yarn build" "cd server && npm build"
scripts.start: concurrently "cd client && PORT=3000 yarn start" "cd server && PORT=5000 npm start"
